record.title: MORNING BUSINESS

speaking.paragraph: Mr. President, I ask unanimous consent that there now be a period set aside to conduct morning business.

record.chair: Without objection, it is so ordered.

speaking.paragraph: And that Senators be permitted to speak for whatever time they wish--that is, at least Senator Reid and Senator McConnell--and thereafter the speeches be limited to 10 minutes each.

record.chair: Without objection, it is so ordered.
